body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting the Bowling Alley Customer Service. My name is Frank Butler. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Betty. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a concern about privacy at the Bowling Alley. Can you tell me how you handle customers' personal information?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Betty. We take data privacy seriously and only collect necessary information for bookings. Can you please provide me with your phone number and email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, four four six, three two one zero, and my email is bettymurphy@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that, Betty. Is there anything else you would like to know or discuss?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, do you have any upcoming events at the Bowling Alley? Also, how do I make a reservation for a lane?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We do have a bowling tournament next month. To reserve a lane, you can call our reservation line or book online through our website. Thank you for your interest.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time and for reaching out, Betty. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact us at any time. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Frank. Have a good day too.
